about-me.title: About me
about-me.text: I'm self-taught, with a strong inclination for continuous learning and problem-solving. I use my skills to develop innovative solutions. I'm passionate about new technologies, especially the CSS and JavaScript ecosystem.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: I started as a Front-End Developer using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I'm looking for challenges, opportunities, and new projects.
